reviews.customers_say: Customers love this summer dress for its beautiful rich red color, great fit that hits just below the knee, and comfortable wear. The fabric quality receives positive feedback, with one customer noting its nice flow, and customers appreciate its versatility as it can be dressed up or down for different occasions. While some customers find it true to size, others mention it runs very oversized. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit and Stunning Design â€“ True to Size!
items.body: I recently purchased the BTFBM Women's Boho Summer Dress in green (X-Large) for Easter, and I couldn't be happier with it! The dress fits true to size and is exactly what I was hoping for in terms of comfort, style, and versatility. Fit: The X-Large fits perfectly for my usual size. Itâ€™s neither too tight nor too loose, offering a flattering yet comfortable silhouette. The V-neck is just the right depth, and the short sleeves give it a relaxed, airy feel. The dress has a flowy, easy fit, and the lace and ruffle details add a beautiful, feminine touch without being too over-the-top. Comfort: The fabric is light and breathable, making it ideal for summer days and beach vacations. It's soft against the skin, and I can move freely without feeling restricted. The hollow-out lace detailing adds just the right amount of elegance while still keeping it casual and perfect for a laid-back vacation vibe. Style: The vibrant green color is stunning and really stands out. The boho design with the ruffle and lace elements gives it a chic, yet relaxed vibe. Whether you're at the beach, lounging by the pool, or out for a casual dinner, this dress works for so many occasions. Overall: This dress is a great purchase! It's true to size, comfortable, and stylish. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a cute, breezy dress that can be dressed up or down. Perfect! Read more
items.author: Britney B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Order more than one, beautiful dress!
items.body: THIS dress! I was looking for a dupe of a more expensive, brand-name summer dress and I stumbled on this one. It's just what I wanted! The color is stunning and true to what's pictured in the listing. Also, if there are any other tall gals considering this item, I'm 5'8" and struggle to find dresses that hit just above the knee. Most dresses are too short for me. Not this one! It hits right above my knee. It's lined and the material is thick and high quality. Sometimes, eyelet can be stiff or itchy but this dress is 100% comfortable. As I said, I'm 5'8" and 167 lbs. I ordered this in a medium and it's perfect. Read more
items.author: Mandy D.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A really good buy!
items.body: This dress is one of the best I have received from Amazon! The material is exactly as portrayed in the pictures. The color, I bought the blue, is true to what is depicted. I am 5 ft 10 inches, 127 pounds and I bought the small. The dress fits as a summer dress should, except for a part in the back which seems to need some more shaping. It is lined with a soft material and is cool, just right for a cruise or a vacation to a warm spot and of course, summer. I washed it, following the instructions on the label, and there was no shrinkage and the color did not fade. A great dress for the price. Read more
items.author: Ang H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Dress & Exceptional Value!
items.body: Iâ€™m in love with the style and material of this dress. The style of this dress will look good on all body types, and age! Just bought the yellow color (gorgeous ðŸ£ yellow) for my mother who is in her 80s, and 5â€™ tall, therefore the length of the dress on her is below the knees, which makes it a modest length for someone her age. I love the dress so much Iâ€™m ordering a second one for me. Read more
items.author: lizzy nunez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little summer dress
items.body: BTFBM is knocking it out of the park this season. Great little dress. It's definitely a light pink, really cute. I'm 5'4" 160 lbs 38B and I ordered a Large. The fit is perfect, the neckline is better than expected, there's no annoying elastic waistband which I don't like on hot summer days, and the dress hits above my knee. The fabric softens after washing it, and I lay on a rack to dry. Perfect little dress to wear around town in the summer with a pair of cute sneakers or sandals. I have two others very similar in white and baby blue from another company on Amazon but I like this one much better because there's no elastic waistband. Read more

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Brown Red, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Lake Blue, Navy, Pink, White, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
